title: Boosted account players
body:
Hi there,

Firstly, I am not sure whether I put this thread in the correct board category.

Anyway, recently I am matched up with players going down from their boosted rank, such as Platinum or high Gold, either in my team or opponent team.
This really destroys the gameplay, as their real rank is around bronze or low silver.

I usually report them immediately as Cheating with message "reporting Boosted Account"

Does this help reducing the boosted account issue?
Can Rito do something about this?

replies.body:
If you suspect that they have been boosted or boosting.
Then its really good to report them.
Any and all accounts that are reported for "Cheating" are looked into by a special team.
Riot however cannot tell you the progress or outcome (I know it sucks)

So either they will get banned/removed.
Or even if they don't, they will eventually drop to their appropriate skill level.
And I know that sucks for some people as they will have a "Feeder/Troll" on there team.

But keep making the community better by reporting those that deserve it.
Don't give up hope, you will have these boosters/Trolls.
Just remember that its 1 game out of 1000.
If you ever have a bad experience, take a break go watch some youtube.
Make Sp4zie can make you laugh or feel better.

Then when your feeling ok again.
Jump into some more games!

its 7 games out of 10 in my case lately haha
but yea, thank you for the encouragement and advise

I will take some days off the Fields of Justice I guess.
While waiting for those dropouts to reach their final ranks.

Maybe and hopefully that's all you need.
Is a break, I would love to play this game everyday (But I cant lol)
But its always good that every 2-3 hours you have a 30 min break.
I had exact problem ... Best thing to do it to sum it a support ticket as most likely way for them to get punished !!!

Not really anything Riot can do about it in the end.

Ultimately your account will end up where your skills set you no matter how many times you get boosted.

Well they should at least proactively encourage users to report boosted account.
Possibly with rewards, even if it is just 100IP or 5 RP
Bad idea because then people are just going to start reporting everyone who is having a bad game/ is on a losing streak as "boosted".
